scripts.build: yarn clean && babel src -d dist --ignore "**/*.spec.js" && copyfiles -u 1 "src/*.d.ts" dist
scripts.release: yarn build && cp README.md package.json dist/ && cd dist && yarn publish --access restricted --non-interactive
scripts.fixit: npm i --package-lock-only && npm audit fix && rm yarn.lock && yarn import && rm -rf package-lock.json
